options.A: IVIG

question_text: In neuromyelitis optica (NMO), which statement is correct?

options.A: It is 10 times more common in males than females
options.B: It is monophasic with no relapses
options.C: NMO lesions show immunoglobulin and complement deposits in a characteristic vasculo-concentric rim and rosette pattern around hyalinized blood vessels
options.D: It primarily affects the peripheral nervous system

question_text: Which of the following indicates disease progression in Multiple Sclerosis (MS)?

options.A: Cerebral atrophy

options.A: Anti-GD1
